artificial_cost_unit = #{artificialCostUnit,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
other_cost = #{otherCost,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
other_cost_unit_code = #{otherCostUnitCode,jdbcType=TINYINT},
other_cost_unit_text = #{otherCostUnitText,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

total_cost = #{totalCost,jdbcType=NUMERIC},

total_cost_unit_text = #{totalCostUnitText,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
total_cost_unit = #{totalCostUnit,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
acre_cost = #{acreCost,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
acre_cost_unit_code = #{acreCostUnitCode,jdbcType=TINYINT},

acre_cost_unit = #{acreCostUnit,jdbcType=NUMERIC},

catty_cost_unit_text = #{cattyCostUnitText,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
catty_cost_unit = #{cattyCostUnit,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
